summary: Frontend testing completed for GFXTAB 3D Portfolio. All UI features working correctly - hero section visible, navigation functional, 6 project cards displayed, project modal opens, contact form modal works, all sections visible when scrolling, social links open in new tabs, 3D WebGL background renders, mobile hamburger menu functional.

minor.issue: Returns 500 error due to invalid Resend API key - EXPECTED behavior per agent context

action_items: Configure valid Resend API key in backend/.env to enable email functionality (currently returns 500 as expected)
critical_code_review_comments: Contact form API error handling is correct - shows user-friendly error message when email fails
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
3D background uses WebGL with proper z-index layering
Mobile responsive design works correctly with hamburger menu
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested and working. Contact form API returns 500 due to invalid Resend API key - this is documented expected behavior. 3D Three.js background renders correctly with stars, galaxy, planets. GSAP scroll animations working. Mobile hamburger menu functional.

hero_section.details: GFXTAB brand, title, subtitle, tagline, Start Project and View Work buttons all visible

navigation.details: Home/Work/About/Process/Contact nav links scroll to correct sections

work_section.details: 6 project cards displayed with images, titles, and categories

project_modal.details: Modal opens when clicking project card, shows image and details, close button works

contact_form_modal.details: Modal opens from nav link and Start Project buttons, has Name/Email/Message fields and Submit button

all_sections_visible.details: Proof, Work, Positioning, Capabilities, Founder, Process, Platforms, CTA, Footer all visible when scrolling

social_links.details: Behance, Instagram, LinkedIn links have correct URLs and target=_blank

3d_background.details: WebGL canvas renders at full viewport size with stars and galaxy effects

mobile_hamburger.details: Hamburger menu visible on mobile, opens nav links, navigation works
